title: StoreFront Project
description: Using NextJs, MongoDB, and Mongoose create a storefront that pulls data from the database and pass the information down to the component parts through NextJS and React.

title: 8Bit Image Convertor
description: Using Scratch, an image converter NodeJS library, convert an uploaded image into 256x256px then convert the image into 16px squares to create an 8bit effect.

title: Entity Framework - Final Project
description: Using Entity Framework and ASP.Net create a passion project SQL database and create Models, Controllers, and views to allow users to use all CRUD methods.

title: Model Car Project Site
description: In a group, use a SQL database and create pages that show users different pages to make use of CRUD features with the database.
